attributes.title: Maga!
attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded the app it asked for my social security number. That’s weird. Then it asked for my address and mother’s maiden name. I gave all my info because how can you not trust an app with trump’s name on it? Anyway the app was a disappointment. Not impressed. Didn’t make me feel like a winner at all so I deleted it. I’ve also now become a victim of identity fraud. I guess millions of families suffer every year 🤷🏻‍♀️?? I don’t know why this bad stuff happens to me. I just want to make America great again 😩

attributes.title: Just No 🥰🧚🏼
attributes.review: So I downloaded this app to support our amazing 🥰president 🟠✨but I was really disappointed 😔 how bad this app was 🤡 I was expecting a really good app since it’s our president is a really amazing 🥰duh 🧚🏼but it toke forever to download. ThIS APP is PRoBABLy THE WORST APP I HAVE EVER 🤢🤮DoWnLoADED. I regret even opening this app it scared the sh**t of of me I started screaming 😱because I saw 🍊 my mom came into my room and said what is wrong and I showed her the 🍊 she fainted cause she was so scared and now we are in the hospital 🤕😒So JuSt don’t download the app 🥰🧚🏼

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! 😡🍤
attributes.review: This app took a MONTH to download and while it was downloading I couldn’t use any other apps! Also I had been saving food and it ate all my food!! 😡😡 I haven’t eaten since 1970 so I am outraged at the fact this app doesn’t have any manners to ask for some food instead of taking it!! Also, while it was downloading it played horrible music and just high pitched noises!! Very outraged and the owner of this platform keeps trying to take my fish on a walk!! 👿👿👿 I can do it myself!!

attributes.title: TERRIBLE!!! I DIED FROM THIS APP
attributes.review: hi this is my ghost writing this review. im telling everyone to never ever download this app. once i downloaded the app (FINALLY) (it took 5 weeks to download) and when i opened it, knives popped put of my phone and stabbed me in the head. i saw that the app hacked my phone after i died and posted my address and credit card information all over tweeter. then the 🍊 came to my house, killed my family, and gave my cat stds. he also baked my grandpas ashes into a pie and ate my pet chickens. never get this app EVER! 😭😭😭😭

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: as a member of gen z 🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈 i decided to support this sexist, racist, transphobic, homophobic, and rapist as a joke 😘 and when i opened the app i was met with an awful looking cheeto dust orange with crispy corn flakes hair and little trumpet ninjas showed up to my house 🙈 this is the worst app ever ✋😔 i would definitely not EVER get this app EVER again 🙈 it’s an awful app and doesn’t show good pictures of the president 🤮 he do be looking like a cheeto dust looking donkey looking like a whole cheeto dust mixed with orange peels and crispy and FAKE yellow hair 🤮 awful combination

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is an atrocity and I am appalled. Soon after purchasing i got many viruses on my devise. And if that wasn’t enough my phone exploded in my hand after using the app once. I am currently in the hospital and Trump (🤮) will be hearing from my lawyers. Forgetting to delete the app, my phone grew a mind of its own and began attacking me as I was defenseless from the previous explosion. I highly recommend you do not burden yourself with getting this app (or voting for trump in the election for that matter). Have a nice day ❤️🙈💐🧚💞

attributes.title: Injury
attributes.review: I downloaded the app to keep track of perfect little orange man’s decisions. Shortly after I did this my phone began to shake violently causing my hands to bruise later on.  I can barely even type now. Once I put my phone down I realized my hands were bright red, pulsating, and swollen. So I did what mr trump said to do and I tried to fix the problem by injecting hand sanitizer into my hands. Once I did this they began to stink, itch, and burn. I was in immense and horrific pain. Thankfully I got to the ER before my hands fell off✨

attributes.title: This is absolute trash🧚💕🦋✨
attributes.review: First let me start off by saying that this app took 300 ages to download (which ik is not far of Mr Trump) but anyways when I need a app at the go then it should take 2 secs to download not this long. Second off the songs in the app were so horrendous that the rats in the streets even decided to move away. And final reason that this app is trash is that when you first log onto the app, there is a huge pig on the front! Like cmon why not put a rat. Thank you for this opportunity!

attributes.title: AWFUL
attributes.review: I am so ashamed to be writing this as a loyal Trump supporter, but sadly as a Technician from Georgia it is my duty to report and call out apps that do not work. As a mother of 4 beautiful children and a supporter of the best man to ever live I just can’t support this application. Firstly, after opening the app many ad pop ups appear, making it very frustrating and difficult to navigate the app. Secondly the lay out is horrendous, unappealing and distracting. Again my apologies but some person has to call this app out :(
